languages.text: "Искусники воздвиженье творенья свершили, сваяли биоплавильни, врата к непогубности. Свершен был шаг в горны нетленья, отринут гнет истлевания плоти, и бытие вечности воплощено было в телах из живого металла. Они же падально набивали чрева нашими душами, ибо такова плата. Лишь избранные Владыки хватко удержали свою самость и от забвения разума воли оградились".

traits.locale_text: "Искусники воздвиженье творенья свершили, сваяли биоплавильни, врата к непогубности — таинству биопереноса. Стопы велики и малы свершили шаги в горны нетленья, бытуя желаньем отринуть гнет истлевания плоти и бытие вечности воплотить в телах из живого металла. Звездные Боги же падально набивали чрева нашими душами, ибо такова оказалась плата за вечность. Лишь ты да избранные Владыки смогли хватко удержать свою самость и сбыться огражденье себя от забвения разума воли".

languages.text: "Our artisans harnessed their craft to erect biofurnaces, the gates of indestructible permanence. And we entered the crucibles of immutability, and the tyranny of the withering flesh was cast off, and an eternal existence in bodies of living metal commenced. While They gorged their maws with our souls like carrion-eating beasts, for that was Their fee. Only select Overlords preserved their selfhood tenaciously and fended off the oblivion of their minds and wills."
languages.original_text: "Искусники воздвиженье творенья свершили, сваяли биоплавильни, врата к непогубности. Свершен был шаг в горны нетленья, отринут гнет истлевания плоти, и бытие вечности воплощено было в телах из живого металла. Они же падально набивали чрева нашими душами, ибо такова плата. Лишь избранные Владыки хватко удержали свою самость и от забвения разума воли оградились".

traits.locale_text: "Our artisans harnessed their craft to erect biofurnaces, the gates of indestructible permanence. And the step was taken, the crucibles were entered; the tyranny of withering flesh was cast off. An eternal existence in bodies of living metal commenced. And They gorged their maws with our souls like carrion-eating beasts, for that was Their fee. Only select Overlords preserved their selfhood tenaciously and fended off the oblivion of their minds and wills."

languages.text: «Nuestros artesanos dominaron su arte para construir hornos biológicos, las puertas de la permanencia indestructible. Entramos en los crisoles de la inmutabilidad, deshaciéndonos de la tiranía de la descomposición de la carne y empezando una existencia eterna en cuerpos de metal vivo. Mientras, ellos saciaron sus fauces con nuestras almas como bestias carroñeras, cobrándose el precio que exigían. Solo unos pocos señores supremos lograron preservar su ser, rechazando la aniquilación de sus mentes y voluntades».
languages.original_text: "Our artisans harnessed their craft to erect biofurnaces, the gates of indestructible permanence. And we entered the crucibles of immutability, and the tyranny of the withering flesh was cast off, and an eternal existence in bodies of living metal commenced. While They gorged their maws with our souls like carrion-eating beasts, for that was Their fee. Only select Overlords preserved their selfhood tenaciously and fended off the oblivion of their minds and wills."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestros artesanos dominaron su arte para construir hornos biológicos, las puertas de la permanencia indestructible. Entramos en los crisoles de la inmutabilidad, deshaciéndonos de la tiranía de la descomposición de la carne y empezando una existencia eterna en cuerpos de metal vivo. Mientras, ellos saciaron sus fauces con nuestras almas como bestias carroñeras, cobrándose el precio que exigían. Solo unos pocos señores supremos lograron preservar su ser, rechazando la aniquilación de sus mentes y voluntades».

languages.text: « Nos artisans ont mis leur savoir-faire à l'œuvre pour ériger des biofournaises, les portes de la permanence indéfectible. Ainsi, nous sommes entrés dans les creusets de l'immuabilité et nous nous sommes libérés du joug de notre chair flétrie pour entamer une existence éternelle dans des corps de métal vivant, tandis qu'Eux se repaissaient de nos âmes comme des charognards, car tel était Leur prix. Seuls quelques seigneurs ont réussi à préserver leur individualité et à combattre l'oubli dans lequel menaçaient de tomber leur esprit et leur volonté. »
languages.original_text: "Our artisans harnessed their craft to erect biofurnaces, the gates of indestructible permanence. And we entered the crucibles of immutability, and the tyranny of the withering flesh was cast off, and an eternal existence in bodies of living metal commenced. While They gorged their maws with our souls like carrion-eating beasts, for that was Their fee. Only select Overlords preserved their selfhood tenaciously and fended off the oblivion of their minds and wills."

traits.locale_text: « Nos artisans ont mis leur savoir-faire à l'œuvre pour ériger des biofournaises, les portes de la permanence indéfectible. Ainsi, nous sommes entrés dans les creusets de l'immuabilité et nous nous sommes libérés du joug de notre chair flétrie pour entamer une existence éternelle dans des corps de métal vivant, tandis qu'Eux se repaissaient de nos âmes comme des charognards, car tel était Leur prix. Seuls quelques seigneurs ont réussi à préserver leur individualité et à combattre l'oubli dans lequel menaçaient de tomber leur esprit et leur volonté. »

languages.text: 「職工たちは技巧を駆使し、生体炉、不快なる永遠への門を建造しました。我々は不変性の坩堝へと入り、衰弱する肉体の専制を脱し、生体金属の体を持った永遠の存在が生まれたのです。彼らは腐肉食の野獣のごとく我らが魂で腹を満たしました。それこそが、彼らの報酬だったからです。強固に自我を保ち、精神と意志の忘却を免れたのは選ばれたオーヴァーロードだけでした」
languages.original_text: "Our artisans harnessed their craft to erect biofurnaces, the gates of indestructible permanence. And we entered the crucibles of immutability, and the tyranny of the withering flesh was cast off, and an eternal existence in bodies of living metal commenced. While They gorged their maws with our souls like carrion-eating beasts, for that was Their fee. Only select Overlords preserved their selfhood tenaciously and fended off the oblivion of their minds and wills."

traits.locale_text: 「職工たちは技巧を駆使し、生体炉、不快なる永遠への門を建造しました。我々は不変性の坩堝へと入り、衰弱する肉体の専制を脱し、生体金属の体を持った永遠の存在が生まれたのです。彼らは腐肉食の野獣のごとく我らが魂で腹を満たしました。それこそが、彼らの報酬だったからです。強固に自我を保ち、精神と意志の忘却を免れたのは選ばれたオーヴァーロードだけでした」

languages.text: “我们的工匠师建造起了生物质反应炉，那便是通往永恒的神圣门户。我们进入了永恒的折磨，我们摆脱了肉体的折磨，接受了活体金属制成的永恒身躯。在那之后，他们像食腐的野兽一样，将我们的灵魂大肆吞噬，因为这便是他们应得的报酬。只有那些最杰出的霸主，才顽强地保留了自我意识，靠着坚不可摧的意志，抵挡住了思想与意识的遗忘过程。”
languages.original_text: "Our artisans harnessed their craft to erect biofurnaces, the gates of indestructible permanence. And we entered the crucibles of immutability, and the tyranny of the withering flesh was cast off, and an eternal existence in bodies of living metal commenced. While They gorged their maws with our souls like carrion-eating beasts, for that was Their fee. Only select Overlords preserved their selfhood tenaciously and fended off the oblivion of their minds and wills."

traits.locale_text: “我们的工匠师建造起了生物质反应炉，那便是通往永恒的神圣门户。我们进入了永恒的折磨，我们摆脱了肉体的折磨，接受了活体金属制成的永恒身躯。在那之后，他们像食腐的野兽一样，将我们的灵魂大肆吞噬，因为这便是他们应得的报酬。只有那些最杰出的霸主，才顽强地保留了自我意识，靠着坚不可摧的意志，抵挡住了思想与意识的遗忘过程。”

languages.text: "Unsere Handwerker haben ihre Fähigkeit genutzt, um Bio-Öfen zu errichten, die Tore unzerstörbarer Permanenz. Und wir sind in die Kreuzfeuer der Unveränderlichkeit getreten, und die Tyrannei des verkümmernden Fleischs wurde abgeworfen, und eine ewige Existenz in Körpern aus lebendem Metall hat begonnen. Während sie sich die Mäuler mit unseren Seelen vollgestopft haben wie aasfressende Bestien, denn das war ihr Lohn. Nur ausgewählte Hochlords haben ihr Selbst hartnäckig verteidigt und das Vergessen ihres Verstands und ihres Willens abgewehrt."
languages.original_text: "Our artisans harnessed their craft to erect biofurnaces, the gates of indestructible permanence. And we entered the crucibles of immutability, and the tyranny of the withering flesh was cast off, and an eternal existence in bodies of living metal commenced. While They gorged their maws with our souls like carrion-eating beasts, for that was Their fee. Only select Overlords preserved their selfhood tenaciously and fended off the oblivion of their minds and wills."

languages.text: "Zanaatkârlarımız, yöntemlerini kullanarak biyofırınlar kurdu. Yok edilemez, kalıcı geçitler inşa etti. Değişmezlik potasına girdik, solan bedenin hükümdarlığına son verildi ve canlı metal bedenin içindeki ebedî varoluş başladı. Bu sırada Onlar, leş yiyen hayvanlar gibi ruhlarımızı tüketiyordu. Karşılığında aldıkları bedel buydu. Yalnızca seçilmiş Efendiler, kendi bireyliklerini inatla korudu ve zihinleri ile iradelerinin yok oluşunu engelledi."
languages.original_text: "Our artisans harnessed their craft to erect biofurnaces, the gates of indestructible permanence. And we entered the crucibles of immutability, and the tyranny of the withering flesh was cast off, and an eternal existence in bodies of living metal commenced. While They gorged their maws with our souls like carrion-eating beasts, for that was Their fee. Only select Overlords preserved their selfhood tenaciously and fended off the oblivion of their minds and wills."
